reviews.review: Найс игра

아 매칭 개똥같네 고랭이랑 파티매칭 잡히니깐 뭐 하지도 못하고 할수도 없잔아. 생존자하면 뭐 하지도 안았는대 발전기 수리 알아서 다 되거나 아니면 고랭 살인마한태 끔살당하고, 살인마하면 생존자 발견하면 발전기 2개 한번에 수리 다되고 그 판은 1킬 하면 다한거임.. 그리고 랜뽑도 많아! 아니 패널티 있다던대 뭐이리 많아 패널티 있느거 맞아? 살인마 할때도 생존자 할때도 랜뽑 세끼들 보면 하고싶지도 않아! 그리고 매크로 볼때마다 신고하는대 잡지도 않는것같고 그리고 파티하면 뭐 포인트 덜 받거나 그런 패널티라도 줘!

Este juego es como una droga es adictivo sabes que es malo pero no puedes parar, como dejas de jugar? simple por muy adictivo que sea todos tenemos un limite en mi caso cuando agregaron los servidores fue un buen momento para dejarlo porque bajo la calidad del juego muchísimo ahora vuelvo y hay un error el error 111 que te quita los puntos, ofrendas y add ons fácilmente he perdido 4 millones de puntos por este error probablemente sean 5 o 6 pero no es fácil llevar la cuenta porque pasa tantas veces, en fin otra vez dejare el juego hasta que arreglen esto y las malditas auras que es imposible ver si piensas comprar esto no lo hagas es repetitivo tedioso con equipo inútil y no hablo de el equipo de survivors inútil que te suelen dar en muchas partidas hablo de el equipo detrás del juego que es difícil entender como pueden hacer todo mal los mapas que son odiados por la gran mayoría de los jugadores, cambios inútiles a muchas cosas en lugar de arreglar las que de verdad necesitan un cambio, terrible matchmaking, nuevo matchmaking que es incluso peor que el anterior, cientos de bugs, perks demasiado fuertes y demasiado débiles para killers y survivors (que prefieren ignorar y cambiar perks que no necesitaban un cambio al menos no tanto como otras perks que rompen el juego) y la lista sigue no he nombrado a los tramposos, la comunidad, y muchas otras cosas pero creo que esto es suficiente para hacerse una idea de lo malo que es y porque digo que es una droga se lo malo que es desearía que no me gustara pero no puedo parar incluso ahora con auras imposibles de ver y millones de puntos perdidos por el error 111 en cuanto lo arreglen seguiré jugando y estoy seguro que habrá mas problemas en el futuro porque los problemas que nombre son problemas que existen ahora no he nombrado los cientos de problemas que después de semanas o meses arreglaron y estoy seguro que como los errores que hay ahora habrá cientos como estos en el futuro y seguiré aquí sufriendo con este juego el mejor consejo para todos nunca probar esto es lo mejor que puedes hacer :)

- The game will be an atmospheric horror for the first few dozen hours, and pretty fun with friends. Eventually after many hours in-game/watching YouTubers/streamers and you get good enough at the game that aspect will completely disappear: chases will sometimes be very fun (though many killers are largely un-interactive in their chase mechanics) and the rest of the time will be an M1 simulator as you sit on a generator wondering if there's a better way to design an asymmetric (horror) game.
- When you are good at the game, playing with friends (Survive With Friends aka SWFing) can be very fun in terms of coordination or clowning around. However, it will give you a huge advantage in groups of 3-4 and you will dunk on a lot of killers. Don't be a dick about it.
- The game design is inherently flawed, even top YouTubers/streamers will often self-police their behaviour as killer in order to make the game more fun for the survivors/themselves. Such a dynamic often leads to salty and toxic players (amongst many other factors such as bs mechanics on both sides). Community is not that bad overall, but salt/toxicity is common enough. Consider turning off chat as killer.
- Matchmaking is pretty low resolution, and you can absolutely end up with teammates/opponents that are not around your skill level.
- The grind is endless, taking many hundreds of hours to get good/meta perks on the characters you want to play.
- The devs often make questionable changes, and nearly every patch breaks something else in their spaghetti code.

The game can be very fun at times, but also very mediocre, frustrating and sometimes downright awful. I don't think I could generally recommend it. If you're interested, I'd recommend first checking out the top YouTubers/streamers to get more of an idea of the game.

I can't handle it anymore, i played 1 year after release, they did some great changes. Now, its just non stop bug bug bug, fix only for survivors, i report people for literally telling me to die, get cancer, fall off and break my neck, etc. Nothing. They just implemented a new system with MMR - kicker? You can't even see your MMR. I am a rank 5 killer, rank 15 survivor, and when I play survivor, i go against rank 1's and get demolished. Before this MMR change on the 3rd/4th/whatever, I still got rank 1 when i was rank 10 on my killer. WHAT? On top of all of that, most people do Survive With Friends, so they have full communication when you, the killer, are doing something or distracted. I can hold my own but after today, and getting 3 gen'd in 1 chase (less than 1min 30 seconds), then getting two and being told to go die because i killed someone, I'm done. I bought so much DLC for this game and havent in a while because the game is so buggy and so unbalanced for killers. If we were talking solo que survivors vs killer, game is great, but thats just not how it is. Its full of SWF (survive with friends) toxic kids at rank 1 who tbag you the entire time, and then get mad when you kill them.

I don't write reviews, at all. You can check my steam profile. I have never seen such a strong, great, Cat Vs Mouse game turn so shit, and all they care about is just adding more survivors/killers and not FIXING THE GAME. And CONSTANTLY BREAKING THE MATCHMAKING SYSTEM. I should NEVER be near a rank 1 as a rank 10, LET ALONE them being on DISCORD with their friends, who have up to 10x more hours then I do.

GG Behavior, I probably won't touch this game for a long time or only with friends, I just wish you would listen to your community.

Edit for today: was called a monkey because i asked if someone was talking to me after the game (if i was a console player), had a game with 4 streamers/friends who got 2 gens done by the time i walked across the map (literally, got there and they double popped in 30 seconds), called toxic because i killed one persons team, "GG EZ" spam every other game, and every other game is Object of Obsession, which u have to tunnel because they are on coms/discord telling their friends when and what i'm doing at every moment, come on Behavior, address some of this please

12/20/21 edit: VHS exists

The game is very addicting, and looks fun on all the tiktoks and videos you see. Do not let those rare matches convince you to buy this game. The development team is not competent in their education, skills, and qualifications. I say that in as respectful a way I can. They never get anything right, each update has problems to a magnitude unheard of in other multi-player competitive games. Updates to the game are rolled out without community review resulting in patches that make players unhappy (see auras), matchmaking is kept a secret and players are forbidden from being able to see the MMR system, & how it operates. This allows the devs to keep players ignorant of what's going on. The player base is very toxic and that toxicity rubs off onto new players allowing a vicious cycle to occur.

TLDR: The dev team keeps players unhappy & ignorant of what they are doing, unhappy players become toxic to each other and begin an toxic cycle.

Rating this game based on the community & my overall experience after playing this game for about 3 years. So as a killer main this game can really be something else lol first off i want to say about 60% of the survivors who play this game are mentally ill children (adults as well..sad eh?) who will talk sh*t at the end game lobby based on if you win or not. The other 40% are the chill ones who will just say "GG" and move on. A couple of games will go a little something like this.

Killer: "MERCILESS VICTORY"

Survivor: YOU B**CH ALL YOU DID WAS TUNNEL AND PROXY ! I SHOULD HAVE DC WHEN I HAD THE CHANCE, YOURE NOT EVEN GOOD AT THE GAME SO DONT THINK IT YOU TRASH!

Killer: "ENTITY DISPLEASED"

Survivor: HAHAHAHA YOU GOT LOOPED ON YOU IDIOT. NEXT TIME DONT USE *PERK NAME* AND YOU WILL ACTUALLY GET A KILL LOL YOURE STILL TRASH

Cringe i know. 

Another thing is the recent useless updates, nerfs & buffs. I can go very in depth about this but would be to long. Lets just say a majority of the changes in the game are in favor of the survivors (devs & mods are survivors mains themselves) because survivor mains CONSTANTLY complain to devs (via email & forums) for unneeded changes that will either BUFF the survivor or NERF the killer. (No matter how much you survivors will say the game is broken and wont come back, they will still come back to play no matter what lol)

If youre a new player reading this review, take this game with a grain of salt (lol) and take a break here and there when playing it. ;) Good concept for a game/Horrible community of a game.

UPDATE 11/28/21

I still think this game is shit due to all the unbalanced updates. Recently got back on to find out survivors now have there own versions of hex totems that dont break LOL. Dead Hard has been buffed which you have to hit a survivor a total of 3 times in order for them to go down. So to all the idiots who still think this game isnt survivor favored, please get your head examined.

My review for this game has flip-flopped a few times in my history of playing. Right now, I can't recommend this game, but that doesn't mean I won't recommend it in the future.

I am a (formerly) rank 1 survivor and a rank 1 killer. The state of the game as it stands is that it takes 7-10 minutes to find a survivor match, and killer matches are instantaneous. I have found that the killer matches are thoroughly unenjoyable, usually because the survivors are way too coordinated. This stems from the fact that the developers don't just accept that Survive With Friends, involving external voice chat through Discord or otherwise, is an integral part of survivor gameplay. I personally think they should add communication in the game and buff the killer in a way so that it is not a complete crapshoot as killer about whether or not you are going to get completely screwed over or not.

A side effect of the above is that almost exclusively the way to win as a killer is to camp a hook or tunnel a survivor. Yes, survivors can do gens in this time, but it still makes the game boring.

Also, I know bugs are just par for the course with games now, but I encountered a bug in this game where a hex totem was literally unreachable by survivors because it was in a blue basket that was facing the wall. I reported this bug, which was a hassle in itself, but they haven't fixed it and it just irritates me.

The concept of this game is great, and I'm sure I will end up playing this game more in the future, but I want to advise people against getting the game in its current state. Not until they AT LEAST address the balancing that causes match-finding times to be so absurd.
